head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths EISELE, MARY E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths EISELE, MARY E.

block.p: EISELE-Mary E., on June 9, 2000, in New York after a long illness. Sister of John L. Eisele of Paris, TX. Aunt of Peter C. Eisele of Colorado Springs, CO, J. Douglas Eisele of Caracas, Venezuela, and David T. Eisele of Paris, TX. Also survived by great-nieces and great-nephews. Notice of memorial service later.

EISELE-Mary E., on June 9, 2000, in New York after a long illness. Sister of John L. Eisele of Paris, TX. Aunt of Peter C. Eisele of Colorado Springs, CO, J. Douglas Eisele of Caracas, Venezuela, and David T. Eisele of Paris, TX. Also survived by great-nieces and great-nephews. Notice of memorial service later.
